Ikkāsa，（?） [uncertain as regard meaning & etym．] at Vin．II，151 （+ kasāva） is trsl．by “slime of trees”，according to Bdhgh’s expl<sup>n．</sup> on p．321 （to C．V．VI，3，1），who however reads nikkāsa．（Page 117）
